title: Horror.In.The.Asylum-SKIDROW
description:
S  K  I  D  R  O  W
.the leading force.

proudly presents

Horror in the Asylum (c) AJ

02-02-2016......Release Date <-> Protection...............Nothing
Adventure..........Game Type <-> Disk(s).....................1 CD

RELEASE NOTES

Every night is the same , once you take those pills the doctors force
on you , you start having nightmares ,and blackouts , imagining the
worst possible scenarios , where you find yourself lost with the demons
of your imaginations , totally lost in time and place , you wander
around to find an exit to your dreams where you will have to solve
puzzles , find and use items while avoiding and hiding from vicious
monsters that are haunting you down .

Features:

Spooky Ambient with various different areas , with different objectives
and puzzles to complete

Various monsters types and tactics to avoid , some with sight detection
, others with noise detection , and some will creep on you if you're
not paying attention .

Logical puzzles , number puzzles and skill based puzzles .

Find and use various items to unlock doors , and break into areas to
escape the mental hospital.

Scary moments with jump scares in different stages of the game.

INSTALL NOTES

1. Unpack the release
2. Mount or burn image
3. Install
4. Play the game
5. Support the companies, which software you actually enjoy!
GREETINGS

To all friends of the family and honorable rival groups!

ascii art by the
godlike & terrific duo
malodix + irokos
titan artdivision
